statements: SELECT * FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_rate FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback ORDER BY efficacy_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT drug_name, feedback FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback WHERE efficacy_rate > 0.8
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, efficacy_rate FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_rate FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY efficacy_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback WHERE drug_name LIKE '%P%' AND feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT AVG(efficacy_rate) AS average_efficacy FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback WHERE patient_id IN (2, 3, 4)
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(drug_name) AS drug_count FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(drug_name) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM DrugEfficacyFeedback
SELECT drug_id, drug_name FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, drug_id FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, drug_id FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drug_reviews WHERE efficacy_rating > 3;
SELECT patient_id, efficacy_rating FROM drug_reviews WHERE drug_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM drug_reviews WHERE efficacy_rating > 3 ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_rating FROM drugs INNER JOIN drug_reviews ON drugs.drug_id = drug_reviews.drug_id WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT AVG(efficacy_rating), COUNT(*) FROM drug_reviews GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY AVG DESC;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name FROM drugs WHERE drug_name ILIKE 'aspirin%' ORDER BY drug_id;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(efficacy_rating) FROM drug_reviews GROUP BY patient_id HAVING SUM > 20;
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_rating FROM DrugFeedback WHERE efficacy_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age <= 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, gender, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT drug_name, efficacy_rating FROM DrugFeedback WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM DrugFeedback WHERE efficacy_rating > 3 ORDER BY drug_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM Drugs WHERE manufacturer='Pfizer'
SELECT drug_name FROM Drugs WHERE drug_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, drug_name, efficacy_rating FROM Patients JOIN DrugFeedback ON Patients.patient_id = DrugFeedback.patient_id
SELECT * FROM drug_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patient_info WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT drug_name, feedback_rating FROM drug_feedback ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM efficacy_rates WHERE efficacy_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT drug_name, manufacture_date, expiry_date FROM drug_details WHERE manufacture_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drug_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY drug_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY dob DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM drug_feedback GROUP BY drug_name HAVING total_feedback > 2 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;

SELECT drug_name, manufacture_date, expiry_date FROM drug_details INNER JOIN efficacy_rates ON drug_details.drug_id = efficacy_rates.drug_id WHERE efficacy_rate >= 0.8 ORDER BY manufacture_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, feedback_rating FROM drug_feedback WHERE feedback_rating < 3 AND drug_name LIKE '%P%' ORDER BY drug_name ASC, feedback_rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM drugs WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT patient_name, feedback_text, date_submitted FROM patients JOIN feedback ON patients.patient_id = feedback.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM drugs WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY drug_name;
SELECT patient_name, feedback_text, date_submitted FROM patients p JOIN feedback f ON p.patient_id=f.patient_id WHERE f.feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT d.drug_name, e.average_efficacy_rate FROM drugs d JOIN efficacy_rates e ON d.drug_id=e.drug_id WHERE e.average_efficacy_rate > 4.5 ORDER BY e.average_efficacy_rate DESC;
